backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining customer, test result, feedback, and appointment types, comparison logic, in‑memory storage arrays/maps, and user profile queries with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, related frontend files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend source file paths to short functional summaries for build and code‑review reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables and dark mode definitions with custom color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme colors, icons, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, fetch caching, and cache cleanup for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routes, protected page guards using auth/handshake state, and global providers.
frontend/src/auth/authStore.ts: Zustand auth store managing login, registration, roles, and handshake state with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main layout with navigation, authentication-aware menus, and logout handling including mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallHelp.t: Shows a dismissible prompt for installing the app as a PWA using the beforeinstallprompt event.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCard: Displays the app URL with copy-to-clipboard and a generated QR code for easy sharing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for content, test results, feedback, and appointments.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode values, and background styling with gradient overlay.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentsPage.tsx: Provides a form for users to submit appointment requests using a mutation hook and displays success or error alerts.
Fetches and displays sorted daily gold updates with loading, error handling, and empty-state messages.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackPage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to submit feedback, sending data via a mutation hook and showing confirmation alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordRequest: Lets users request a password reset by saving their mobile number locally and showing a confirmation message.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles owner and customer login flows with authentication, backend handshake, error handling, and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/owner/DailyGoldUpdate: Owner tool to add and view daily gold rate updates using canister queries and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerDashboardP: Renders the owner dashboard with tabs for managing test results, gold updates, appointments, feedback, users, and password resets, including data fetching and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/owner/PasswordResetsS: Displays and refreshes password reset requests from localStorage and allows generating and assigning 4‑digit passcodes via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/owner/TestResultsMana: Provides a dialog form for adding or updating test results and submits them through a mutation with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/owner/UsersUpdateSect: Fetches and displays customer records with refresh capability and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Provides a customer registration form that validates input, registers the user via backend and local storage, and handles errors.
frontend/src/pages/ResetPasswordWithPass: Form-based page for resetting a password using a 4‑digit passcode stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays app settings, including biometric lock support and toggling stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/ShopInfoPage.tsx: Static page showing the shop’s address, contact numbers, and operating hours.
frontend/src/pages/TestResultsLookupPage: Allows users to search test results by serial number with history stored in localStorage and handles query errors.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Welcome dashboard showing different navigation options based on user role.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/canisterErrors.ts: Extracts readable error messages from various canister error formats, handling nested structures and common patterns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing stored values including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app features, architecture notes, known issues, and versioning for a role-based web application.
